body_html:
You can run tests yourself by using bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/contrib/image/.... In that case, you have modified __init__.py, but did not change the build rule:
https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/image/BUILD#L73
You need to add ":single_image_random_dot_stereograms" to the dependencies.
body_text:
You can run tests yourself by using bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/contrib/image/.... In that case, you have modified __init__.py, but did not change the build rule:
https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/image/BUILD#L73
You need to add ":single_image_random_dot_stereograms" to the dependencies.
body:
You can run tests yourself by using `bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/contrib/image/...`. In that case, you have modified `__init__.py`, but did not change the build rule: 
https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/image/BUILD#L73
You need to add `":single_image_random_dot_stereograms"` to the dependencies.
